00032 
00033 #ifndef _LUSTRE_LFSCK_H
00034 # define _LUSTRE_LFSCK_H
00035 
00036 #include <lustre/lustre_lfsck_user.h>
00037 #include <lustre_dlm.h>
00038 #include <lu_object.h>
00039 #include <dt_object.h>
00040 
00041 struct lfsck_start_param {
00042         struct lfsck_start      *lsp_start;
00043         __u32                    lsp_index;
00044         unsigned int             lsp_index_valid:1;
00045 };
00046 
00047 /* For LE_PAIRS_VERIFY returned status */
00048 enum lfsck_pv_status {
00049         LPVS_INIT               = 0,
00050         LPVS_INCONSISTENT       = 1,
00051         LPVS_INCONSISTENT_TOFIX = 2,
00052 };
00053 
00054 typedef int (*lfsck_out_notify)(const struct lu_env *env, void *data,
00055                                 enum lfsck_events event);
00056 
00057 int lfsck_register_namespace(const struct lu_env *env, struct dt_device *key,
00058                              struct ldlm_namespace *ns);
00059 int lfsck_register(const struct lu_env *env, struct dt_device *key,
00060                    struct dt_device *next, struct obd_device *obd,
00061                    lfsck_out_notify notify, void *notify_data, bool master);
00062 void lfsck_degister(const struct lu_env *env, struct dt_device *key);
00063 
00064 int lfsck_add_target(const struct lu_env *env, struct dt_device *key,
00065                      struct dt_device *tgt, struct obd_export *exp,
00066                      __u32 index, bool for_ost);
00067 void lfsck_del_target(const struct lu_env *env, struct dt_device *key,
00068                       struct dt_device *tgt, __u32 index, bool for_ost);
00069 
00070 int lfsck_start(const struct lu_env *env, struct dt_device *key,
00071                 struct lfsck_start_param *lsp);
00072 int lfsck_stop(const struct lu_env *env, struct dt_device *key,
00073                struct lfsck_stop *stop);
00074 int lfsck_in_notify(const struct lu_env *env, struct dt_device *key,
00075                     struct lfsck_request *lr, struct thandle *th);
00076 int lfsck_query(const struct lu_env *env, struct dt_device *key,
00077                 struct lfsck_request *req, struct lfsck_reply *rep,
00078                 struct lfsck_query *que);
00079 
00080 int lfsck_get_speed(struct seq_file *m, struct dt_device *key);
00081 int lfsck_set_speed(struct dt_device *key, __u32 val);
00082 int lfsck_get_windows(struct seq_file *m, struct dt_device *key);
00083 int lfsck_set_windows(struct dt_device *key, int val);
00084 
00085 int lfsck_dump(struct seq_file *m, struct dt_device *key, enum lfsck_type type);
00086 
00087 static inline void lfsck_pack_rfa(struct lfsck_request *lr,
00088                                   const struct lu_fid *fid,
00089                                   __u32 event, __u16 com)
00090 {
00091         memset(lr, 0, sizeof(*lr));
00092         lr->lr_fid = *fid;
00093         lr->lr_event = event;
00094         lr->lr_active = com;
00095 }
00096 
00097 #endif /* _LUSTRE_LFSCK_H */
